评论概述: Comfortable wrinkle free wedding guest dress
评论详情: I bought this dress to pack for an overseas wedding. The blue was a bit brighter than it looked in the photo, but that was OK for me. What I really appreciated was that even though it looked incredibly wrinkled when unpacked, every wrinkle fell out after it hung for a day. I had measured myself and used the chart to select a size, and it fit perfectly. The dress was very comfortable and stylish, and I even received several compliments. By pairing he dress with white flats for the "French country" outdoor wedding, I truly "hit the right note". I would buy here again, confident that the size chart would give me the right fit.
